MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.Builders.DiscriminatorBuilder HasDiscriminator(class Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.Builders.EntityTypeBuilder entityTypeBuilder) cil managed

Docs.param: The builder for the entity type being configured.

Docs.returns: A builder that allows the discriminator column to be configured.
